Jx.Grid.RowModel

Extends: Jx.Object

A class defining a grid row.

Inspired by code in the original Jx.Grid class

Summary
Jx.Grid.RowModelExtends: Jx.Object
Options
useHeadersdefaults to false.
alternateRowColorsdefaults to false.
rowClassesobject containing class names to apply to rows
rowHeightThe height of the row.
headerWidthThe width of the row header.
headerColumnThe name of the column in the model to use as the header
Functions
initCreates the row model object.
getGridRowElementUsed to create the TR for the main grid row
getRowHeaderWidthdetermines the row header’s width.
getHeightdetermines and returns the height of a row
useHeadersdetermines and returns whether row headers should be used
getRowHeadercreates and returns the header for the current row
getRowHeaderColumnreturns the name of the column that is used for the row header

Options

useHeaders

defaults to false.  If set to true, then a column of row header cells are displayed.

alternateRowColors

defaults to false.  If set to true, then alternating CSS classes are used for rows.

rowClasses

object containing class names to apply to rows

rowHeight

The height of the row.  Make it null or ‘auto’ to auto-calculate.

headerWidth

The width of the row header.  Make it null or ‘auto’ to auto-calculate

headerColumn

The name of the column in the model to use as the header

Functions

init

init : function ()

Creates the row model object.

getGridRowElement

getGridRowElement : function (row,
text)

Used to create the TR for the main grid row

getRowHeaderWidth

getRowHeaderWidth : function ()

determines the row header’s width.

getHeight

getHeight : function (row)

determines and returns the height of a row

useHeaders

useHeaders : function ()

determines and returns whether row headers should be used

getRowHeader

getRowHeader : function (list)

creates and returns the header for the current row

Parameters

listJx.List instance to add the header to

getRowHeaderColumn

getRowHeaderColumn : function ()

returns the name of the column that is used for the row header
